purpose: Initializes the program by accepting current date values, opening input files, and setting up initial status flags.
Reads a record from the first input file and moves it to the root segment for processing, or sets end-of-file flag if no more records.
Reads a record from the second input file, validates the root segment key, and prepares child segment data for insertion or sets end-of-file flag.
Closes both input files and displays error messages if either file fails to close properly.
Terminates the program abnormally by setting return code 16 and displaying an abend message when a file open error occurs.
Abends the program with return code 16 if an input file fails to open.
Inserts a root segment into the IMS database using data read from INFILE1.
Abends the program if the root segment insertion into IMS fails with an unexpected status code.
Inserts a child segment into the IMS database after qualifying the parent root segment using the root key.
Performs an IMS ISRT call to insert a child segment after successfully retrieving the parent root segment.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the GU call to the root segment fails.
Abends the program with return code 16 when the ISRT call for the child segment fails.
